page.title: 13A HEADCORN CHILD'S DAY 1985
page.content: We have to get up for school but first we have some breakfast. I sometimes have Frosties,toast and honey and some sort of drink,normally lemon squash. Then I have to walk to school,past many shops and houses. My dad has gone to work by now. He works at his shop which is next door to our house. We have to be at school by 9.00a.m. and we finish at 3.15p.m. During this time we do Maths and English and many other subjects. For school dinners you can have a such things as spaghetti Bolognese or fish fingers and chips. There is always a pudding. Our classroom has wooden desks and pictures around the walls. We write with ball point pen,ink pen or pencil. During playtimes we play on the playground with our friends. We play ball throwing games. When I get home I have my tea and watch T.V. or play.
